actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 6-inch bench grinders for grinding, polishing or otherwise finishing metal or cement, valued under $3,025 each.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 6-inch bench grinders for grinding, polishing or otherwise finishing metal or cement, valued under $3,025 each.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 6-inch bench grinders for grinding, polishing or otherwise finishing metal or cement, valued under $3,025 each.
